name: RegisterClientTooltipComponentFactoriesEvent
description: Allows users to register custom ClientTooltipComponent factories for their TooltipComponent types. This event is not cancellable, and does not have a result. This event is fired on the mod-specific event bus , only on the logical client .

fields.name: factories
fields.type: Map < Class <? extends TooltipComponent >, Function < TooltipComponent , ClientTooltipComponent >>

parameters.name: factories
parameters.type: Map < Class <? extends TooltipComponent >, Function < TooltipComponent , ClientTooltipComponent >>

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a ClientTooltipComponent factory for a TooltipComponent .
